The '''Microsoft Xbox Cape''' is a [[cape]] that was given to Microsoft employees on ''[[Xbox 360 Edition|Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition]]''.

== Distribution ==
This cape was given out to Microsoft employees, who were also given the ability to toggle the cape's visibility.<ref>{{tweet|PopsRamjet|1128979747382452224|archiveid=20220326205242|#minecraftmemories Time to pull another photo of out the archives :) Once upon a time we used to have the ability to turn capes on & off on in #MinecraftXBLA #MinecraftX360 This is the cape that Microsoft folks had when they played online! @mojang had one too & our 1st birthday!|May 16, 2019}}</ref>
